sentence.Network_en: In a misguided attempt to be funny, he manages only offensiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他本想表现得风趣一点，却弄巧成拙地冒犯了别人。

sentence.Network_en: She only did it in a misguided attempt to help.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是要帮忙，只是想法不对头。

sentence.Network_en: These misguided people go around preaching up violence.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些误入歧途的人到处鼓吹暴力.

according to one writer , when we sing' That's why we're champions' after a goal goes in , it is the most misguided chant on the terraces of English football grounds .那个作者认为，当球队打入扳平比分的进球时，们高唱的“这就是为什么我们是冠军”，是英超赛场上最具误导性的歌曲。

list.abs: with this misguided view of education , students convince themselves again and again that learning is a mechanism by which one accomplishes other goals .对教育的错误认识，使学生一次又一次地确信学习只是一种手段，可以靠它达到别的目的。
Some people tend to tenaciously cling to the misguided concept of racial superiority ., 一些人顽强地坚持种族优越性的错误观点.

entry.tran: (观点、计划)受错误思想引导的；（人）被错误地引导的，被引入歧途的
entry.def: If you describe an opinion or plan as misguided, you are critical of it because you think it is based on an incorrect idea. You can also describe people as misguided.

example.ex: In a misguided attempt to be funny, he manages only offensiveness...
example.tran: 他本想表现得风趣一点，却弄巧成拙地冒犯了别人。

example.ex: He is misguided in expecting honesty from her.
example.tran: 他误以为她能够以诚相待。

sentences.sentence: "an ill-conceived plan to take over the company"

means.word_mean: 2. wrong in e.g. opinion or judgment;

auth_sentence.content: Opponents of the bill label it misguided and dangerous.
auth_sentence.res_content: Opponents of the bill label it misguided and dangerous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Opponents of the bill label it misguided and dangerous.

auth_sentence.content: He was completely misguided and wrong to do so.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was completely misguided and wrong to do so.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was completely misguided and wrong to do so.

auth_sentence.content: Comparisons with Silicon Valley are misguided, he says.
auth_sentence.res_content: Comparisons with Silicon Valley are misguided, he says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Comparisons with Silicon Valley are misguided, he says.

Sentence.sentence: That means making some difficult decisions with elderly patients, and going against the misguided belief that when it comes to health care, more is always better.

It is also of concern that the misguided advice that students should speak only English is given primarily to poor families with limited educational opportunities, not to wealthier families who have many educational advantages.

means.word_mean: 由错误思想指引的,不明智的

sentences.en: These misguided people go around preaching up violence.
sentences.cn: 这些误入歧途的人到处鼓吹暴力。

sentences.en: Their approach to the problem is fundamentally misguided.
sentences.cn: 他们解决这个问题的方法从根本上说是判断错误的。
